{{Description|The halls of death do not welcome the deluge of living things.<br>Walk through the winding corridors to clean up the overpopulating Fungi and [[slime]]s, along with those [[hilichurl]]s who should not have occupied the place to start with. Perhaps such offerings will lead to unexpected rewards?|Suspiration of the Deceased}}
'''City of the Deceased''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] located in [[The Sands of Al-Azif]], [[Desert of Hadramaveth]], [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]]. It contains one level, '''Suspiration of the Deceased'''.
